name: Splat (Tristan3)
description:
Hi there,

My name is Tristan and I am 14 years old.  This is my submission to the GMTK 2021 game jam. The theme was "joined together" and my approach on the theme was that you shoot balls that join or stick together in order to complete various levels. There are 5 levels in total. Instructions are in game. I hope you enjoy.
